subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Justin Rose secured the European tour’s money title by reaching a three-way playoff at the Volvo Masters at Valderrama, where he rolled in a 12-foot putt at the second extra hole to win the season-ending tournament over Simon Dyson and Soren Kjeldsen in Sotogrande, Spain. Rose rallied after losing a four-shot lead with nine holes to play to top the money list, known as the Order of Merit.
